episodes.title: Happy New Year
episodes.plot: Five years after the Justice League were controlled by Vandal Savage, their time under his control comes back to haunt them. The Team has to take on alien invaders, starting with Lobo.

episodes.title: Earthlings
episodes.plot: The team of Miss Martian, Superboy, Beast Boy and Adam Strange are sent to the planet Rann.

episodes.title: Alienated
episodes.plot: The invading Kroloteans receive aid from an unexpected ally.

episodes.title: Salvage
episodes.plot: Superboy and Blue Beetle take on Intergang, while Nightwing tries to salvage the soul of a former comrade.

episodes.title: Beneath
episodes.plot: Blue Beetle searches for a missing friend, while the team of Miss Martian, Batgirl, Bumblebee and Wonder Girl return to Bialya.

episodes.title: Bloodlines
episodes.plot: A mysterious intruder appears inside Mount Justice claiming to be a time-traveling visitor from the future.

episodes.title: Depths
episodes.plot: Artemis returns to the team to protect an important satellite launch.

episodes.title: Satisfaction
episodes.plot: Green and Red Arrow try and stop the original Speedy from taking his revenge on Lex Luthor.

episodes.title: Darkest
episodes.plot: An old friend returns to Mount Justice and takes revenge to prove himself to his new masters.

episodes.title: Before the Dawn
episodes.plot: Aqualad meets the Light's partner and learns of their plans for Earth while Miss Martian's revenge backfires on her. Meanwhile, the team meets a new, seemingly unbeatable super villain.

episodes.title: Cornered
episodes.plot: The team is trapped inside the Hall of Justice for a cage match against a brutal alien gladiator!

episodes.title: True Colors
episodes.plot: When the Reach forms a devil's alliance with Lexcorp, Robin leads a squad undercover to investigate.

episodes.title: The Fix
episodes.plot: Black Manta seeks vengeance against Miss Martian.

episodes.title: The Runaways
episodes.plot: Nightwing tasks Blue Beetle with chasing down a group of potentially dangerous super-powered teenage runaways. But Blue Beetle is not the only one hunting them....

episodes.title: War
episodes.plot: A conqueror from another world becomes a wild card in an intergalactic game of supremacy - placing planet Earth square in the jackpot.

episodes.title: Complications
episodes.plot: Black Manta gives Miss Martian 24 hours to live, but that may be more time than Aqualad has, with Sportsmaster and Cheshire on the hunt for his head!

episodes.title: The Hunt
episodes.plot: A band of misfits is put to the test when Lex Luthor sends them behind enemy lines ... to rescue the team!

episodes.title: Intervention
episodes.plot: The team embarks on a desperate endeavor to free Blue Beetle!

episodes.title: Summit
episodes.plot: The Light calls a summit to decide the final fate of Aqualad, the team ... and the entire planet Earth!

episodes.title: Endgame
episodes.plot: When the earth is threatened by the Reach, the team must team up with Lex Luthor and fight the reach with out the Justice League.
